messages.title: Theresa May's Plan for a Stronger Britain
messages.content: Secure the best deal from Brexit to control our laws, borders and money. New markets around the world for our goods and services. More and better-paid jobs with new rights and protections for workers. The chance to own your own home with more affordable housing. Tackling the cost of living and keeping taxes low. Increased schools funding every year and real technical education for young people. Extra funding for the NHS and proper care for the elderly. Security for our children online and personal data protected. The choice at the General Election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with me and the Conservatives or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure the best deal from Brexit to control our laws, borders and money. New markets around the world for our goods and services.
More and better-paid jobs with new rights and protections for workers.
The chance to own your own home with more affordable housing.
Tackling the cost of living and keeping taxes low.
Increased schools funding every year and real technical education for young people.
Extra funding for the NHS and proper care for the elderly.
Security for our children online and personal data protected.

mentions.candidate: Carolyn Abbott is standing with me as my local candidate for the Gedling constituency.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The choice at the General Election is between strong and stable leadership in the national interest with me and the Conservatives or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Secure the best deal from Brexit to control our laws, borders and money. New markets around the world for our goods and services. With a strong negotiating hand on Brexit, we can guarantee our economic security. My position on Brexit is well known, and it will put Jeremy Corbyn on the back foot before he even begins negotiating.
issues.economy: My plan will build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.
issues.education: Increased schools funding every year and real technical education for young people.
issues.health: Extra funding for the NHS and proper care for the elderly.
issues.labourEmployment: We will give everyone a chance to get on in life by building enough affordable housing and ensuring our strong economy will pay for a strong NHS.

community.content: Carolyn supports Theresa May's plans for modern industrial strategy to make sure Gedling prospers from targeted infrastructure investment and opportunities for local residents.

images.caption: Carolyn Abbott standing with Theresa May.
